name: Red and Blue ~ Cycles of Existence
name_original: Red and Blue ~ Cycles of Existence
description:
At the planet Somelody…
When she was a child, Salieka almost downed in the sea near Seahant Island, but a mysterious and beautiful woman save her life. Her name is Taralise.

Since that day, Salieka is madly in love with her.

Now that she’s 16 years old, she wants to find Taralise and confess her feelings, but it will end in tragedy.

(Note: This game contains strong language.)Features
  • Two versions of the tragic tale, as “Cycles”, Red and Blue.
  • 3.265 words.
  • Steam Achievements.The default & original language of the game is French.
    To toggle English, go the Préférences and select English.
